entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
